channel.title: SilesianTomcat on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in SilesianTomcat on ZooBerry

item.title: Caribbean Flamingo
item.description: The brightest Caribbean flamingos, showing true red, pink, or orange colors on their legs, bills, and faces.

item.title: Dama Gazelle (ES Version)
item.description: The ES version of one of the gazelles in the Gazelle Pack by SilesianTomcat.

item.title: European Beaver
item.description: European Beaver (Eurasian Beaver), the first animal created by Panda11.

item.title: King Cheetah
item.description: A unique cheetah variant with elongated and merged spots.

item.title: King Penguin
item.description: A large penguin species with fixed alphabetical issues and fame stars in the mod.

item.title: Kodiak Bear
item.description: The Kodiak bear is a recolored grizzly bear adapted to tundra environments.

item.title: Red Ruffed Lemur
item.description: The red ruffed lemur is one of the largest primates of Madagascar, with thick red and black fur.

item.title: Rhea
item.description: A large, flightless bird of South America with new skin, sound, and enrichment.

item.title: Domestic Donkey (ES Version)
item.description: Domestic Donkey: 100% Endangered Species design. Includes new skin, sound, food, and enrichment.

item.title: Forest Elephant
item.description: A species of elephant native to African rainforests.

item.title: Forest Elephant (ES Version)
item.description: A species of elephant native to African rainforests, featuring new enrichment and sound.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.
